00004 namespace
00005 {
00006   btScalar abs_column_sum(const btMatrix3x3& a, int i)
00007   {
00008     return btFabs(a[0][i]) + btFabs(a[1][i]) + btFabs(a[2][i]);
00009   }
00010 
00011   btScalar abs_row_sum(const btMatrix3x3& a, int i)
00012   {
00013     return btFabs(a[i][0]) + btFabs(a[i][1]) + btFabs(a[i][2]);
00014   }
00015 
00016   btScalar p1_norm(const btMatrix3x3& a)
00017   {
00018     const btScalar sum0 = abs_column_sum(a,0);
00019     const btScalar sum1 = abs_column_sum(a,1);
00020     const btScalar sum2 = abs_column_sum(a,2);
00021     return btMax(btMax(sum0, sum1), sum2);
00022   }
00023 
00024   btScalar pinf_norm(const btMatrix3x3& a)
00025   {
00026     const btScalar sum0 = abs_row_sum(a,0);
00027     const btScalar sum1 = abs_row_sum(a,1);
00028     const btScalar sum2 = abs_row_sum(a,2);
00029     return btMax(btMax(sum0, sum1), sum2);
00030   }
00031 }

00035 btPolarDecomposition::btPolarDecomposition(btScalar tolerance, unsigned int maxIterations)
00036 : m_tolerance(tolerance)
00037 , m_maxIterations(maxIterations)
00038 {
00039 }
00040 
00041 unsigned int btPolarDecomposition::decompose(const btMatrix3x3& a, btMatrix3x3& u, btMatrix3x3& h) const
00042 {
00043   // Use the 'u' and 'h' matrices for intermediate calculations
00044   u = a;
00045   h = a.inverse();
00046 
00047   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_maxIterations; ++i)
00048   {
00049     const btScalar h_1 = p1_norm(h);
00050     const btScalar h_inf = pinf_norm(h);
00051     const btScalar u_1 = p1_norm(u);
00052     const btScalar u_inf = pinf_norm(u);
00053 
00054     const btScalar h_norm = h_1 * h_inf;
00055     const btScalar u_norm = u_1 * u_inf;
00056 
00057     // The matrix is effectively singular so we cannot invert it
00058     if (btFuzzyZero(h_norm) || btFuzzyZero(u_norm))
00059       break;
00060 
00061     const btScalar gamma = btPow(h_norm / u_norm, 0.25f);
00062     const btScalar inv_gamma = btScalar(1.0) / gamma;
00063 
00064     // Determine the delta to 'u'
00065     const btMatrix3x3 delta = (u * (gamma - btScalar(2.0)) + h.transpose() * inv_gamma) * btScalar(0.5);
00066 
00067     // Update the matrices
00068     u += delta;
00069     h = u.inverse();
00070 
00071     // Check for convergence
00072     if (p1_norm(delta) <= m_tolerance * u_1)
00073     {
00074       h = u.transpose() * a;
00075       h = (h + h.transpose()) * 0.5;
00076       return i;
00077     }
00078   }
00079 
00080   // The algorithm has failed to converge to the specified tolerance, but we
00081   // want to make sure that the matrices returned are in the right form.
00082   h = u.transpose() * a;
00083   h = (h + h.transpose()) * 0.5;
00084 
00085   return m_maxIterations;
00086 }
00087 
00088 unsigned int btPolarDecomposition::maxIterations() const
00089 {
00090   return m_maxIterations;
00091 }
00092 
00093 unsigned int polarDecompose(const btMatrix3x3& a, btMatrix3x3& u, btMatrix3x3& h)
00094 {
00095   static btPolarDecomposition polar;
00096   return polar.decompose(a, u, h);
00097 }
